trans-unit.source: Provides access to the main buffered graphics context object for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce l'accesso all'oggetto di contesto principale grafica memorizzata nel buffer per il dominio applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsManager class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: La classe BufferedGraphicsManager consente di implementare il doppio buffer personalizzato per le immagini.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Le immagini che utilizzano il doppio buffer possono ridurre o eliminare lo sfarfallio causato da ridisegnare una superficie di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: This class has one static property, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, which returns the main <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe ha una proprietà statica, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, che restituisce l'oggetto principale <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>per il dominio applicazione corrente.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class creates <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> instances that can be used to draw buffered graphics.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>Crea classe <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>istanze che possono essere usate per disegnare la grafica memorizzata nel buffer.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>classe non dispone di alcun costruttore pubblico e deve essere creato dal <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>oggetto per un dominio applicazione mediante il relativo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>(metodo).</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile recuperare il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>oggetto per il dominio applicazione corrente da statico <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information on double buffering, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, and <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul doppio buffer, vedere [grafica a doppio buffer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>e <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> per il dominio applicazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: Within an application the Current property always returns the same <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object.
trans-unit.target: All'interno di un'applicazione corrente proprietà restituisce sempre lo stesso <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> per il dominio applicazione corrente.
